data.author: Chris Lewis
data.description:
The Split Horizon: Seconds Edition watch face, now for SDK 2.0. 

This watch face animates markers at 15 second intervals, and the whole face each minute.

data.author: Mandaria Software

changelog.release_notes: Fixed crashing issues with newer firmware versions of Pebble
- Fixed app name to fit Pebble screen / made app name more consistent. It's now called "Fuzzy French"

data.description:
- Shows the current fuzzy time in French. Updates every five minutes
- Shows the current date in French
- Shows the current week and day number
- Shows the current time. Updates every minute
- Vibrates from 8am to midnight at the top of every hour

This is an altered version of Frenchy Fuzzy by peaz.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed crashing issues with newer firmware versions of Pebble

data.title: Fuzzy French

data.author: Stew Wilson
data.description:
A combination of Fuzzy Time and Simplicity, using UK time descriptions (such as "past" rather than "after").

Based on the "jps British" watchface, converted to SDK 2.0
data.title: Fuzzy Time UK

- 12/24 hour format - respect Pebble setting
- Day of the week, Month day number (Mon, Nov 25)

This is simple watchface. battery indicator and bluetooth status icon.
When the bluetooth connection is lost the watch will vibrate.

data.author: orviwan

changelog.release_notes:
Added support for Time, Time Steel, Time Round and Pebble 2
Optimised for 4.0
Clay configuration (choose colors)
Fixed Yahoo! Weather.

Fixed small memory leak (Thanks Ron)
Adjustment to weather URL

Added 'Fixed GPS Location' setting
Added 'Battery Indicator' using dots: 100/80/60/40/20/0
Fixed 0 degrees bug
Fixed Bluetooth Disconnect Vibration
Now displays ??? when weather cannot load

data.description:
YAWWF (Yet Another Weather Watch Face)

It uses Yahoo! Weather, has 48 weather conditions and updates every 30 minutes.

Configuration options:
- Choose a colours for top/bottom halves
- Weather units (c/f)
- Bluetooth disconnect vibration
- Hourly vibration
- Blink
- Date suffix
- Battery Indicator Dots
- Localised dates

latest_release.release_notes:
Added support for Time, Time Steel, Time Round and Pebble 2
Optimised for 4.0
Clay configuration (choose colors)
Fixed Yahoo! Weather.

data.title: Chunk Weather

data.author: rafasinger
data.description: This is a version of the Orviwan's amazing 91 DUB with the classic touch of the Casio watches.
data.title: CASIO

data.author: Dexif
data.description: Pebble Anonymous watchface
data.title: Pebblemous

data.author: Ice2097
data.description: Clean and easy to read. Has month, day and day of the week at the bottom in a matching font.
data.title: Pix

data.author: Ice2097
data.description: A BigTime variant, with a classic arcade score font, and the day, month, and date at the bottom.
data.title: Arcade Time

data.author: Lloyd Hannesson
data.description: A simple watch face with the Winnipeg Jets hockey logo in the middle. Just a fan of the team, no copyright claims to the logo are made.
data.title: Winnipeg Jets

data.author: lastfuture

changelog.release_notes: Squared 4.0 will now not vibrate for bluetooth disconnects during quiet time
This version adds the activity tracking options for Pebble 2 watches back into the config page

This huge update introduces battery level and step goal. Configure what you'd like to see in the bottom row instead of the date or what you'll see at a flick of your wrist.
Also memory usage has been improved and a couple of tiny cosmetic bugs have been fixed

This release adds localized weekday names. Just set your watch to one of the six languages.
A bug was also fixed, that sometimes showed a leading zero even if leading zeroes were turned off.
This update fixes an issue related to 12-hour format and Battery Saver

This version of Squared adds the Weekday as an option instead of the month.
It also adds a new color called "Quartz" which is an opalecent white. Check it out!
Bugfixes for black and white Pebbles

This update adds a bunch of new features:

Preview: See your watchface configuration directly on the type and color of watch you're currently wearing.

Battery Saver: Choose a time of night (or day) during which animations will not play to save battery.

Charging: Improve readability on your nightstand by enabling high contrast mode or always-on backlight for as long as your watch is plugged in.
This update adds vibration on bluetooth disconnect as an option and a preview of the watchface directly in the settings page
Improved performance when in developer mode by removing excessive logging of messages.
Added the option to center-align the date. Makes it look much nicer on round Pebbles
Fixed a bug that caused the settings page to crash some black and white Pebbles
Small Bugfix for black and white Pebbles
This is a huge making Squared ready for all Pebbles. Make sure to check out the settings page to customize your experience.

data.description:
A slick collection of squares showing you time and date. Customize colors and appearance.

Choose any color combination and preview the result right away.
You decide on the date format, if you want the weekday or leading zeroes.
See your step goal and your battery level ... or don't. Your call.
Enable features that are great for nightstand charging and battery saving.

Available for all Pebble smartwatches.

Initial release by lastfuture
Port to SDK 2 by jnm
Port to SDK 3 and colorization by hexahedria
continued development since SDK 3.8.2 by lastfuture

latest_release.release_notes: Squared 4.0 will now not vibrate for bluetooth disconnects during quiet time

data.title: Squared 4.0

data.author: Meiguro
data.description: Watch floating discs bounce against each other at the flick of your wrist. Shake your wrist to give them a jolt. The customary physics disc demo as a Pebble watchface! [Charge your Pebble daily when solely using this watchface.]
data.title: Floaty Discs

data.author: Travis La Marr
data.description: An eye catching word clock for your wrist
data.title: KlockToo

data.author: acymbalski

changelog.release_notes: Fixed long names like "Wednesday" from being shortened.

data.description: Displays time as progress bars showing progression through the hour, day, week, month, and year.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed long names like "Wednesday" from being shortened.

data.title: Progressor

data.author: Jnm

changelog.release_notes:
Adapted battery gauge design to PTR
Added PTR preview in the config page
Added option to hide outer dial border
Rewrote for SDK 3.0 + preparation for color!
Added on option to disable date on shake
Added a battery gauge display option
Fixed hour numbers on top and bottom of screen
Changed to bigger font size & added a 1 sec delay before animation after a wrist flick (to be able to read the hour before showing the date).
Added animation to show day of month after a wrist flick
Should be a bit more accurate.
Added Configuration Screen for Colors & Vibration

data.description:
Time is displayed using a ruler that scrolls as time goes by.
Configuration Screen allows to choose your color theme, display options & enable/disable vibration on hour.

Time is displayed using a ruler that scrolls as time goes by. Configuration Screen allows to invert colors & enable/disable vibration on hour.

3.11 : Battery Gauge adapted to Pebble Time Round! Also added a PTR preview on the config page.

3.10 : Pebble Time Round Support ! Battery Gauge will be replaced for PTR with a version that better fits the round screen.
3.9: Full Color Support for PebbleTime!
3.8: Added option to hide outer dial border
3.7: First step to prepare color version
3.6: Adds an option to disable Date on shake
3.5: Adds a battery gauge display option!
3.4: Adds 12hr mode support and 'Legacy' mode with 'like in the old days' display :)

Original idea + code by Dave Smylie.
2.0 port by me.
data.title: Ruler Watch Reloaded

data.author: Jens Bocklage

changelog.release_notes: Fix for saving user selected colors
Chose your own colors for drawing the QR Code and the background.

Added three color schemes for the color display Pebble.
More to come!
Now supporting Pebble Time and watchface configuration

Big update!
It shows time, date and day of week as QRCode!

- Supports English and German
- 12h and 24h mode
- Shows battery status
- Shows bluetooth status

The QRCode is calculated in real time!

NOW ADDED A CHEAT MODE!
Simply activated by the same guesture as turning on the backlight!
(psssst! It shows current time for 5 seconds!)

data.description: It shows time, date and day of week as QRCode! - Supports English and German - 12h and 24h mode - Shows battery status - Shows bluetooth status The QRCode is calculated in real time! NOW ADDED A CHEAT MODE! Simply activated by the same guesture as turning on the backlight! (psssst! It shows current time for 5 seconds!) Thanks to Kentaro Fukuchi for his QRCode lib! Check out my other watchfaces :)

latest_release.release_notes: Fix for saving user selected colors

data.title: QRWatch watchface - The good one!

data.author: arytbk

changelog.release_notes:
- Jewish date now changes at sunset instead of midnight
- removed leading 0 for 12-hour time display

- Fixed Sun Graph display for the new Pebble OS.
- I removed the Zman hour and time until next hour from inside the Sun Graph since most people did not want it...

- Fixed display of secular and hebrew month names.
- I tried to fix the Sun graph display but no success so far...
Better temporary fix for the 2.0 drawing bug which prevents the Sun Graph from being displayed correctly.

data.description:
Features:
- Gregorian & Jewish date
- Moon phase
- Sun/Day Graph
- Sunrise (Netz), mid-day(Hatzot) & Sunset (Skhia)
- Mincha Alerts (vibration and message) for Mincha Gdola, Ktana, Plag & 18 mn before Shkia/Sunset.
- Battery and Bluetooth status, vibrates if Bluetooth connection is lost.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Jewish date now changes at sunset instead of midnight
- removed leading 0 for 12-hour time display

data.title: Jewish Clock

data.author: Number3
data.description: A simple but elegant watch face. The outer ring is the minutes, the inner one the hours. The date is displayed in the center (month/day).
data.title: Disk Clock

data.author: FNystrom
data.description:
Owner of an eliq online? Then this is the watchface for you.
It displays the electricity consumtion so far today together with a forecast and the current power usage.
It's also possible to display a temperature from temperatur.nu.
The Bluetooth connection status and the battery status is displayed.

Update: Now it contains a month view where you can see the forecast for the current month. Just flick the watch to switch between the views.
data.title: EliqEffect

v1.1.0

Chrono2: A "sweep analog" watchface with a smooth second hand

- this watchface was created from the combination of the Brains watchface from the SDK 1.0 and the simple_analog watchface provided as an exmaple with the SDK 2.0

Mark J Culross (KD5RXT)
mjculross@sbcglobal.net

data.description:
Chrono2: A "sweep analog" watchface with a smooth second hand

NOTE: due to the high update rate of the display, Chrono2 is likely to deplete your Pebble battery quicker than other watchfaces

Mark J Culross (KD5RXT) mjculross@sbcglobal.net

data.author: Bmachine
data.description:
Watchface based on new iOS7 Home screen for SDK 2.0

Shows Bluetooth connection status and watch battery power status when the watch is tapped. This display remains visible for a minute and then disappears.
This status display remains visible when the watch is being charged.
Only works with SDK 2.0 firmware.
data.title: iOS7Home - SDK2.0

data.description: A digital watch with large digits using Jokerman font. - SDK 2.0 version

Watchface based on new iOS7 Home screen for SDK 2.0 - Inverted (black on white)

Shows Bluetooth connection status and watch battery power status when the watch is tapped. This display remains visible for a minute and then disappears.
This status display remains visible when the watch is being charged.
Only works with SDK 2.0 firmware.

data.author: Foxel

changelog.release_notes:
Colored icons for Time watches
Pebble 2 support
Removed redundant font resources. File now weights under 10 KB.

data.description:
Simple watchface based on simplicity.

Features:
* battery-efficient rendering
* week day display
* battery indicator
* bluetooth indicator
* connection break indicator and vibe
* easy colors inversion

To change the background tap or shake a watch in first 2 seconds after watchface start (e.g. go to pebble menu, press back and shake)
data.title: Simple F

data.author: Samalander
data.description: Big H is a watchface that shows the hour (12/24) and minutes in big numbers, the weekday with the dates of 3 days before and after, the full date, a seconds indicator with minimal battery impact and a watch battery indicator. Many of the above aspects are configurable (the seconds indicator is optional, the weekday can be written out in English, French or Spanish, etc.).
data.title: Big H

data.author: BobTheMadCow

changelog.release_notes:
1) Added settings (Colour inversion, animation duration, and vibrate on hour)
2) Battery indication now requires tap on the Z axis to activate; so towards/away from you, rather than up/down or left/right as you look at the screen. Previously required a tap in any direction.
3) Removed a source of potential crashes
Tweaked animation timings and improved switching between battery and time display

data.description: Tells the time by lighting up words from behind. Animated on launch and when changing which words are lit.

latest_release.release_notes:
1) Added settings (Colour inversion, animation duration, and vibrate on hour)
2) Battery indication now requires tap on the Z axis to activate; so towards/away from you, rather than up/down or left/right as you look at the screen. Previously required a tap in any direction.
3) Removed a source of potential crashes

data.title: Lightbox

data.author: BobTheMadCow

changelog.release_notes:
1) No longer crashes! 
2) Added settings! 
    > colour
    > animation speed
    > vibrate on hour

data.description: Big clear time display in text (for the hours) and numbers (for the minutes) in a nice Tim Burton-esque font

latest_release.release_notes:
1) No longer crashes! 
2) Added settings! 
    > colour
    > animation speed
    > vibrate on hour

data.title: Burton

data.author: BobTheMadCow
data.description:
Time, in bar format.

Left bar for hours (00-23 for 24 hour mode, 1-12 in 12 hour mode).

Right bar for minutes 0-59.
data.title: Time Bars

data.author: lesliesbird

changelog.release_notes: 3.3 - Added support for Pebble Time Round, fixed 24hr time display
3.2 - Now compatible with Pebble Aplite with 3.8 firmware.

data.description: A watchface version of the Spinning Dancer Illusion. The illusion was created in 2003 by Nobuyuki Kayahara. The pirouetting figure can appear to spin in either direction, due to a lack of visual cues for depth. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spinning_Dancer for more information.  It takes practice but you will be able to make the dancer change direction.   Donate: 1JbxfRpG4iv3qscRe8wgFBXbNhmPesP723
data.title: Dancer Illusion

data.author: lesliesbird
data.description:
Show your love for the Commodore 64, the best-selling computer model of all time, according to Guinness! 16 colors from the C64 color palette revolve around the outside every second . An actual C64 was used for reference for the creation of this watchface. The border was created using an emulator and then saved out as a frame animation. 

Donate: 1JbxfRpG4iv3qscRe8wgFBXbNhmPesP723
data.title: C64 Love

data.author: Bert de Ruiter
data.description: A digital watchface with a block font.
data.title: Blockr

Features

data.author: Huy Duc Le
data.description:
DHTime is a beautiful watchface that shows the current  date, time, battery, connection info. It's optimized for Pebble 2.0.

Main features:
- Display current date with format DD/MM/YYYY
- Battery Level Indicator: Low, Medium, High, Fully and Charging
- Charging Vibration
- Bluetooth Connect/Disconnect Vibration

data.author: Tony H
data.description:
Fuzzy time clone with connection and battery notifications. 

Text inverts with vibe alert when bluetooth connection is dropped.

Battery charge level is displayed on watchface once it drops below 30%, and constantly whilst charging.
data.title: T Time

data.author: stix

changelog.release_notes: Fix bugs uncovered on v3 firmware.
Simpler. Smaller. Faster. New version scheme.
Add little circle in the middle of the analogue watchface, as seems to be the norm. It does make it look neater.

data.description: Simple square analog design, with digital time and date, designed to be clean, and easy to read at a glance.

latest_release.release_notes: Fix bugs uncovered on v3 firmware.

data.title: Square

data.author: Work In Progress
data.description:
A watchface inspired by the Phosphor watch.
It's simple and clean for day to day use.
data.title: Phosphor

data.author: Work In Progress
data.description: TextWatch watchface in Romanian language with the same animations as the first party one.
data.title: TextWatch RO

data.author: sarfata
data.description: Never miss a chance to catch the ISS station when it flies above your head with this watchface!
data.title: Pebble Sat

data.author: Mattias Bcklund

changelog.release_notes: Change URL has moved to a new host.
* Fix case where some configurations were not respected after restart
* Fixed an issue where some settings reverted after restart.

No more vibrating notifications during quiet time!
 Connection lost notification is configurable
 Shake to show date and exact time
 Support for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2 (if anyone has one)
Added German language (eastern and western flavour)

- Add Spanish language
- Make changes to line length calculations to make better use of screen size

- Add a new 'small bold' text type to fit the Italian word 'quattro' on a single line.
- Minor fix for Dutch greetings
Fixed a bug that prevented older Pebble watches to receive configuration.

- Added italian language
- Fixed issue with bad UUID (sorry if your watchface was uninstalled)

- Added Dutch language
- Added configurable time offset
- Added translated Connection Lost messages
- Fixed issue where Connection Lost was reported too often

3.3 solves two bugs.
- Time was off by one hour between hh.57 and hh.59
- Language choice was reset every time the watchface restarted

Add configurable languages:
- Swedish
- English
- Norwegian

- Added configurable colors
- Buzz and message on loss of bluetooth connection
- Greeting message on startup
Den senaste versionen stdjer Pebble Time och inte minst Pebble Round med den nya upplsningen.
Compiled with SDK 2.0B7 and bumped app version number to 2.0.0

data.description:
Supports: English, Swedish, Norwegian, Italian, Spanish, German and Dutch
 
This watchface combines the easy to read fonts of Text Watch with the natural language of Fuzzy Time in several languages and colors.

Features:
 -Fuzzy time in natural language (five minute precision)
- Several languages to choose from (English, Swedish, Norwegian, Italian, Spanish, Dutch)
- Fully configurable colors
 - Vibrates and shows a message when phone connection is lost
 - Large and easy to read typeface
 - Configurable offset for the five minute precision
 - Nicely animated transitions

latest_release.release_notes: Change URL has moved to a new host.

data.title: Fuzzy Text Plus

data.author: Mattias Bcklund

changelog.release_notes:
- Compatibility with all Pebble models up to Pebble Time Round
- Configurable colors 
- Buzz and message on lost bluetooth connection 
- Greeting message on startup

data.description:
This watchface is deprecated and will no longer receive updates. For more features and future updates, download the "Fuzzy Text Plus" watchface instead.

It has all the features of this watchface and more, including configurable language.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Compatibility with all Pebble models up to Pebble Time Round
- Configurable colors 
- Buzz and message on lost bluetooth connection 
- Greeting message on startup

data.title: Fuzzy Text (deprecated)

data.author: SetPebble
data.description:
Bot Buddy is a tamagotchi-type watchface suggested by my 11-year-old son.  A robot is displayed that animates every so often or if your Pebble is tapped.

Customizable features include background, date format, hourly vibrations, and animation frequency.
data.title: Bot Buddy

data.author: jmad1
data.description:
New Mexico Lobos Watch Face

Everyone's a Lobo, Woof Woof Woof!

Digital watch (12 or 24 hour format) that displays a quick animation every 5 minutes. 

Author: Joe Madrigal
data.title: Lobo Time

data.author: p10n.net
data.description:
A nice analogue watch bigger than your Pebble's screen  pincushion / TV tube.

  Big dial
  Better reading
  Unique look

The zoomed view follows the minutes hand at each quarter; you can still easily read the hours hand because of the larger angular steps.

A member of the popular Zoom family of Pebble watchfaces (over 2.400 downloads as of early 2014).

Visit p10n.net for more!
data.title: Zoom4 white

  Big dial
  Better reading
  Unique look

The zoomed view follows the minutes hand at each quarter; you can still easily read the hours hand because of the larger angular steps.

Zoom0 is a member of the popular Zoom family of Pebble watchfaces (over 2.400 downloads as of early 2014).

Feedback welcome  visit p10n.net for more!
data.title: Zoom0 white

data.description:
An LCARS-inspired Pebble watchface. Boldly going where no Pebble watchface has gone before!

Displays the time, date, stardate, battery level and bluetooth status.

Developed by Zach Bruggeman, ported to 2.0 by ad1217.

1.1: Changes color on face tap or firm shake.
Displays Time, Date, Day of the Week, Month, Battery Percentage, and Year.

Known glitches: Charging bug.

data.description:
Sprite taken from Kyoukai no Kanata. Watch face shows: Day of the week, day number, month, year, time and battery percentage.

This is my first app and I wanted it to do something more than simply show an image and the time so I added the inverter shake function. Shake the watch and you can switch between two variants of the face: Light and Dark!

Known bugs: charging glitch

latest_release.release_notes:

Displays Time, Date, Day of the Week, Month, Battery Percentage, and Year.

Known glitches: Charging bug.

data.author: ihtnc
data.description:
A modified WordSquare watch face (by Hudson and Jnmattern) to support tap gestures for displaying basic info. 

Bluetooth = "X" at the bottom of the screen if disconnected
Battery level = Squares on the left side of the screen
Day of the month = Digits at the right side of the screen

Some settings are configurable via the Pebble phone app.
data.title: Smart Square (PH)

data.author: ihtnc
data.description:
A modified WordSquare watch face (by Hudson and Jnmattern) to support tap gestures for displaying basic info. 

Bluetooth = "X" at the bottom of the screen if disconnected

Day of the month = Digits at the left side of the screen

Some settings are configurable via the Pebble phone app.

changelog.release_notes:
- California (31 buoys)
- Florida (5 buoys)
- Hawaii: Oahu, Maui, Kauai and Big Island (7 buoys)
- UK (3 buoys)
- France (2 buoys)

data.description:
Transform your Pebble in a real surf watch. Forget about tide watches, now you have the information about waves size and wind speed updated every hour on your wrist.

This is the best tool for surfers in California, Florida, Hawaii, UK and France. You just have to set up your beach or buoy and the information is available for you 24/7.

Note: It does not work without the companion app.

latest_release.release_notes:
- California (31 buoys)
- Florida (5 buoys)
- Hawaii: Oahu, Maui, Kauai and Big Island (7 buoys)
- UK (3 buoys)
- France (2 buoys)

data.title: Watch Surf - The world's first surf watch

Simple animations for telling time and Bluetooth connectivity.
Works with both 12-hour and 24-time, goes by what ever your pebble is set to.

data.author: Chris Lewis
data.description:
Same as the CMD Time watchface, but each minute the commands are 'entered' by an imaginary user by animations.

+Realism
data.title: CMD Time Typed

data.author: Luke Scharf
data.description:
Displays all battery and information provided by the Pebble OS.  Battery state is shown both as precise text, and also as an easy-to-read graph.

The screen is automatically updated whenever the status changes.

This version appears as a watchface, and does not clutter up your watch's main menu.    An alternative version of this tool is available as a watch app ("Battery Status Application").
data.title: Battery Status Watchface

data.author: Kostik
data.description:
The weather is nice, eh?
Real Canadian weather - realtime conditions,warnings and alerts, wind chill and Air Quality Health Index. Just plain text - no stupid icons. Wherever in Canada you are - be aware, stay safe.
data.title: Real Canadian Weather

data.author: Giraffokeryx
data.description:
Displays time using a mix of Mayan number systems. The hour uses hieroglyphs, the minute in the Mayan base-20 system of lines and dots.

See http://www.mayan-calendar.org/mayan-numbers/mayan-number-system.html for reading instructions.

Thanks to spazenport for the design, image editing and testing.
data.title: Mayan hieroglyphs
